issue.title: [R] [C++] Resolve code duplication in ExecPlan_BuildAndShow and ExecPlan$BuildAndShow()
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17185](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17185). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When adding a print method for ExecPlans in R we chose to copy some of the code from `ExecPlan_prepare` to `Exec_Plan_BuildAndShow` and from `ExecPlan$Run()` to `{}ExecPlan$BuildAndShow(){`}. 

Relevant PR: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13541 (ARROW-15016)
